description:
The route we took is a combination of good groomed trails and back country trails. Best if there was a recent dump of fresh snow. Beautiful scenery with well-marked trail numbers. Be sure to carry a map and ski with someone.
This trail is near:
directions: Start at Parking lot #7 near Old Chelsea in Quebec.  Put GPS coordinate of #7 (45.490992,-75.842196) in Google Maps to get driving directions. I forgot to log GPS data until Shilly Shally cabin. Simply follow trail #1 to get there.
title: Gatineau Park Backcountry Ski
